faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Creating that perfect {tagName} logo with BrandCrowd is easy - but just in case, here's some FAQs to help you get started.

questions.question: What is the BrandCrowd [tagName] logo maker?
questions.answer: BrandCrowd's [tagName] logo maker allows you to generate and customize stand-out [tagName] logos in seconds. BrandCrowd gives you access to a professional library of thousands of customizable [tagName] logo designs - making creating your [tagName] logo inexpensive and straightforward. Our logos, created by designers around the globe, give you unlimited possibilities.

questions.question: Do I get a transparent version of my [tagName] logo?
questions.answer: Absolutely! A transparent version of your [tagName] logo is provided when you download in a PNG format. Even if you've chosen a solid background for your [tagName] logo, we'll provided a version of your logo with a transparent background for your convenience - perfect for use on your website.

questions.question: What layout works best for [tagName] logos?
questions.answer: You want your [tagName] logo to standout above competitors. Your logo should tell your audience, customers, fans and competitors that you mean business. There's no single answer for what layout your [tagName] logo should have - but keep in mind what message your want to convey with your logo. A simple layout can convey elegance and sophistication, while a more dynamic layout can mean fun or adventure. Search our logo collection for a design then customize it according to your needs. Remember you can also research [tagName] logos - pay attention to their layout, color choices, design themes and fonts.

questions.question: What text should I choose for my [tagName] logo?
questions.answer: What's in a name? If you haven't already got a name for your [tagName] logo then here's some tips. You want to use text and a name that describes your business, the caliber of service you provide and one that resonates with customers. If you're stumped, research other companies with [tagName]s for logo ideas. Remember your [tagName] logo should have a catchy and non-offensive name that's sits well with the whole team. Try to keep the logo text short and simple using a bold clean font, so it's easily recognisable on your [tagName] logo.

questions.question: How do I find the right [tagName] logo?
questions.answer: Simply put, [tagName] logos are visual representations of what your business is all about. The logo you choose will become synonymous with your brand, so it pays to choose wisely. BrandCrowd offers access to a library packed with [tagName] logos created by professional designers from around the world. Find the perfect [tagName] logos is as simple as searching the library, customizing the logo to your liking and downloading. Remember, keeping your [tagName] logo simple with three or fewer colors and clean fonts produces an effective, eye-catching logo.

questions.question: How do I add a tagline to my [tagName] logo?
questions.answer: It's easy to enhance your [tagName] logo with a tagline. A tagline is usually added at the bottom of your logo and consists of a short piece of text like a motto or catchphrase. Taglines that work include three to seven memorable words. Like an advertising jingle or popular song, this additional text on your [tagName] logo helps further associate your design with your brand. You can add a tagline in a few clicks with BrandCrowd's free logo maker.

questions.question: Can I download my [tagName] logo instantly?
questions.answer: Yes. Now that you've created the perfect [tagName] logo, it's time to put your design to work. BrandCrowd allows you to download your logo instantly and gives you access to all the files you need. BrandCrowd provides files perfect for producing business cards, marketing and print materials, for using on your website or blog and for branding those social media posts. All the logo files you need are available in your account.

questions.question: Do I get my [tagName] logo in vector format?
questions.answer: Of course. Your [tagName] logo from BrandCrowd is provided in several formats including vector files (PDF and SVG). No matter how large you want your [tagName] logo, it'll look great. Vector files are used to create print layouts and illustrations as they ensure the same quality appearance across all formats and sizes.
